::Neody::

Neody spins around, aiming his weapons behind him. He nerviously scans
the area.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Johnny Brennan" <thejerkyboysare@h...> wrote:
> Suddenly the howl was heard again, much closer. So close that it
sounded 
> like it was right behind Neody.
> 
> 
> >From: Yanshosh@a...
> >Reply-To: nbwrpg@y...

> >::Neody::
> >
> >Neody looks toward the direction where the scream had come from. It
> >had curled his mech fluid, and he didn't think that whatever had
made
> >that scream was very happy now.
> >
> >"Ramjet, do you want anyone to check out what's up with that
scream?"
> >he asks Ramjet over the comm, beginning to feel uncomfortable in
the
> >open.
> >
> >
> >
> >

> > > Suddenly, a mech fluid curdling howl could be heard in the
distance
> >followed
